participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Introverted and imaginative, often lost in thought. Enjoys exploring fantasy worlds through gaming.
participant_1.background: i faint at the sight of blood. i've an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. my dream in life is to work from home. i dye my hair every three months.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Resilient yet struggling, coping with personal loss and seeking solace in social media and work.
participant_2.background: i work at a nursing home. i am overweight and unhappy. my wife left me and took my children. i spend most of my time on facebook when i am not working. i don't believe in god.
